ModMetaData.name: RimFridge - A17
ModMetaData.author: Kiame Vivacity
ModMetaData.description:
Adds refrigerated racks to keep food and other perishables cold. Ideal for use in dining rooms, freeing up labour from feeding prisoners, or keeping food on hand for cooks.
Comes in both 1x1 and 1x2 versions.
Thanks to everyone who's helped translate this mod! Dragomano - Russian 53N4 - Spanish duduluu - Chinese phmalu - Portuguese Breakyt - French
Original Author: Vendan
